charges.charge_disposition: AMENDED: IMPRISONMENT: 327 Months. PRIOR TOTAL IMPRISONMENT: 405 MONTHS as to Counts 2,3,5,6,7,8,9, and 12 to run concurrent; 5 Years as to Count 11 to run concurrent with 2,3,5,9 and 12; 20 Years as to Counts 13, 14, and 15 to run concurrent with each other and all other counts. SUPERVISED RELEASE 5 Years as to Counts 2,12,13,14, and 15;
